nodes.text: Krennic's Office was an office used by Commander Orson Krennic during his time as head of the construction of the Death Star on Geonosis. After surviving an assassination attempt by saboteurs sabotaging the battle station's construction, Krennic and Darth Vader spoke in Krennic's office about who he thought was behind the sabotages. Sometime later after Vader had traveled to the office of Galen Erso, he returned to Krennic's office to question the commander about his findings.
